document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 177''' was released in April of 2010 in online format only. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:
document_data.The Deck of Many Things:
:''By [[Rodney Thompson]], illustrated by [[William O'Connor]].'' '''p. 57–68'''
A look at the notorious ''[[deck of many things]]'', with color images of a complete deck of cards ready for printing. {{Dusup|177/Deck of Many Things}}
document_data.Realmslore: Vaasa:
:''By [[Brian James]], illustrated by [[Peter Tikos]], cartography by [[Mike Schley]].'' '''p. 77–83'''
A visit to [[Vaasa]] under the rule of the [[Warlock Knights]]. {{Dusup|177/Realmslore: Vaasa}}

;Characters
:[[Darlisan]] • [[Kaggen Entreri]] • [[Borigon Hillsafar]] • [[Grintalalch]] • [[Telvannah]]

;Organizations
:[[Stoneclub]]
document_data.[[Eye on the Realms]]: The House of Naer:
: ''By [[Ed Greenwood]], illustrated by [[Christine MacTernan]].'' '''p. 95–97'''
A detailed look the wealthy and influential [[Naerhand]] family of the [[Sword Coast]] and [[Western Heartlands]]. {{Dusup|177/Eye on the Realms: The House of Naerhand}}
